ComicInfo.Summary:
In Un/Sacred Vol 2, Mirka and her special guests invite you once again into the world of Angelina, Damiano, and their daughter Eden! Issue 6 gives us two endearing stories. In “Pongo”, we meet an angelic looking dog that that ends up being a real devil, and causes quite the commotion. And in “The Blue Pills” we fast forward for a glimpse into the life and marriage of what are now a very old (but still amusing) Damiano and Angelina.
